name: Touhou Chouseisho ~ Sapphire Panlogism
description:
A Touhou Project fangame by Team Urban Magic, and the first fully-fledged game
to use the Touhou Danmakufu ph3sx engine.

Features of this game include:

  • 4 playable characters: the usual pair of incident resolvers
    plus two familiar, yet unexpected, protagonists.
  • The usual 6-stage story mode, along with an Extra mode
    and some bonus unlockable content.
  • A soundtrack containing over 20 songs, put together by Frogmask
    and Spectral Nexus, with a couple of guest stars in the mix.
  • Sheep?!

We hope you enjoy this rainier-than-usual Touhou experience.
We spent a lot of time on it (really).

Touhou Project is © Team Shanghai Alice.
This game is a derivative work with no affiliation with Team Shanghai Alice.

Current version: v1.00a.
